content: MT-CT-H4 OC Strut splice plate Flat channel connector used as a longitudinal extender for MT channels, for outdoor use with low pollution ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Adjustable – easily fit and repositioned along strut channels Compatible with Twist-Lock channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Applications Connecting two MT strut channels together Compatible with multiple MT strut channels Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q235 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q235 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2322412 - Channel tie MT-CT-H4 OC - Package Size 15 pc
